poem:
### Public Shaming

In shadows long,
a voice, spectral
sings intricate songs
of shame, blurred

each touch—
bare, electric
tracing the arc of sin,
unseen stains on ivory skin

once, red-faced
we'd hide—
now, ghostly
whispers praise
ungrasped
in a world of screens
& spectral grace.
